summary.para: Flags to provide when starting a virtualization instance.

Specifies that ProjFS should maintain a "negative path cache" for the virtualization instance. If the negative path cache is active, then if the provider indicates that a file path does not exist by returning HRESULT_FROM_WIN32(ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND) from its PRJ_GET_PLACEHOLDER_INFO_CB callback, ProjFS will fail subsequent opens of that path without calling the PRJ_GET_PLACEHOLDER_INFO_CB callback again.
To resume receiving the PRJ_GET_PLACEHOLDER_INFO_CB for paths the provider has indicated do not exist, the provider must call .
